Articles.Content:
in light of the recent advancements to the beautiful seas of Kerbin and the recent viewing of Yellowbeard I would like to celebrate by gathering the finest sea dwelling, swashbuckling, and capable crew.


Moesly Armlis spoken in pirate speak does not sound like something to be feared.

Something like Moesly Dangerous ,but still I won't get no respect, ya know what I mean.


Have to go with what generated first.

[B]Wyatt "Ivory Bones" Mackie[/B][B]"[/B]
The Drunkard of Turtle Shore!
This pirate be loaded to the Gunwales on grog!


[URL="http://pirate.namegeneratorfun.com/"]
Ya scurvy dogs get yourself a pirate name and join me at Davy Jones locker![/URL] Edited November 21, 2015 by MoeslyArmlis
